description: Emulates spaciousness and distance by aggressively scooping the midrange and boosting the extreme high frequencies to enhance reverb and ambience.

bands.notes: Small lift for foundational low-end depth and rumble.
Moderate lift for full bass tone without being too dominant.
Cut to remove 'boxiness' and begin the midrange scoop.
Strong cut in the core human hearing range to push the perceived sound source away from the listener.
Moderate cut, continuing the scoop to dampen the direct presence of instruments and vocals.
Small lift for some clarity, avoiding a dull sound.
Maximum boost for ambience, cymbals, and room reflectionsâ€”creating a sense of space.
Aggressive boost for maximum 'air,' sparkle, and perceived size of the virtual space.
